description: This table extracts information about the submissions of Hospice Item Set (HIS) dataset records.

columns.name: DATASET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the data set record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: HIS_SUBM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the type of HIS submission in the submission history. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Submission


Correction


Resubmission


Inactivation

columns.name: HIS_SUBM_INST_MRK_DTTM
columns.description: Instant that HIS submission was marked.

columns.name: HIS_SUBM_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user who submitted the HIS data set. Links to table CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: HIS_SUBM_FILE_DATE_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of the HIS submission.

columns.name: HIS_SUBM_KEY_ITEMS
columns.description: HIS submission key items history information.
